</td>
<td> 1 <span style="white-space:nowrap"><a href="/Robe" title="Robe"><img alt="Robe.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/6/64/Robe.png?version=05ce330ae8199c1fbd600fe0a06eb192" height="28" width="30"></a> <a href="/Robe" title="Robe">Robe</a></span> and 10 <span style="white-space:nowrap"><a href="/Ruby" title="Ruby"><img alt="Ruby.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/a/a9/Ruby.png?version=af543cfa67f07bba3eed621535c62aef" height="18" width="18"></a> <a href="/Ruby" title="Ruby">Ruby</a></span>.
</td></tr>

<tr>
<td> <a href="/File:Gypsy_robes_m.png" class="image"><img alt="Gypsy robes m.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/3/30/Gypsy_robes_m.png?version=d4b22059005ab3fed83e941878c9fa96" height="48" width="30"></a> <a href="/File:Gypsy_Robes_f.png" class="image"><img alt="Gypsy Robes f.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/b/b7/Gypsy_Robes_f.png?version=ac422952dfe803ec4e3e115626b29b34" height="48" width="30"></a>
</td>
<td> <a href="/Gypsy_Robe" title="Gypsy Robe">Gypsy Robe</a>
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> Chest
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> 2
</td>
<td> +6% magic damage and critical strike chance,<br> -10% mana costs
</td>
<td> Sold by the <a href="/Traveling_Merchant" title="Traveling Merchant">Traveling Merchant</a> for <span data-info="30000" style="white-space:nowrap" title="3 Gold Coins">3 <img alt="Gold Coin" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/1/1f/Gold_Coin.png?version=eac744abdf82b79ce189bf47a5726ad4" height="16" width="12"></span> <span data-info="5000" style="white-space:nowrap" title="50 Silver Coins">50 <img alt="Silver Coin" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/4/4e/Silver_Coin.png?version=b4e2b0d7a433c954a865b85ad6e1ba41" height="14" width="12"></span>.
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Miscellaneous_Armor">Miscellaneous Armor</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/index.php?title=Armor&amp;veaction=edit&amp;vesection=5" title="Edit section: Miscellaneous Armor" class="mw-editsection-visualeditor">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-divider"> | </span><a href="/index.php?title=Armor&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5" title="Edit section: Miscellaneous Armor">edit source</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<p>A few pieces of armor aren't part of any particular set.
</p>
<table class="terraria">
<tbody><tr>
<th> Item
</th>
<th> Body Slot
</th>
<th> Defense
</th>
<th class="unsortable"> Bonuses
</th>
<th class="unsortable"> Cost / Source
</th></tr>


<tr>
<td> <span style="white-space:nowrap"><a href="/Diving_Helmet" title="Diving Helmet"><img alt="Diving Helmet.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/c/cb/Diving_Helmet.png?version=536084bcc3f3513e918f9eae9210f676" height="22" width="22"></a> <a href="/Diving_Helmet" title="Diving Helmet">Diving Helmet</a></span>
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> Head
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> 2
</td>
<td> Greatly extends underwater breathing time
</td>
<td> Rare drop from <a href="/Shark" title="Shark">Sharks</a> and <a href="/Orca" title="Orca" class="mw-redirect">Orcas</a> (<abbr style="border-bottom-width: 0; cursor:pointer;" title="Console Version"><img alt="Console only.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/6/6c/Console_only.png?version=0148da45eb9eb5adcc6d6a225b15ed20" height="13" width="20"></abbr> <abbr style="border-bottom-width: 0; cursor:pointer;" title="Mobile Version"><img alt="Mobile only.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/b/b2/Mobile_only.png?version=84d3f97faa2d469c734c2b03aa115202" height="16" width="16"></abbr>).
</td></tr>


<tr>
<td> <span style="white-space:nowrap"><a href="/Viking_Helmet" title="Viking Helmet"><img alt="Viking Helmet.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/7/72/Viking_Helmet.png?version=dd002c749d2c44af2222837e7fa0d9e3" height="28" width="24"></a> <a href="/Viking_Helmet" title="Viking Helmet">Viking Helmet</a></span>
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> Head
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> 4
</td>
<td>
</td>
<td> Rare drop from <a href="/Undead_Viking" title="Undead Viking">Undead Vikings</a>.
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td><span style="white-space:nowrap"><a href="/Night_Vision_Helmet" title="Night Vision Helmet"><img alt="Night Vision Helmet.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/0/02/Night_Vision_Helmet.png?version=dcc5015f585e44ce8a2d145bf491b168" height="20" width="20"></a> <a href="/Night_Vision_Helmet" title="Night Vision Helmet">Night Vision Helmet</a></span> (<abbr style="border-bottom-width: 0; cursor:pointer;" title="PC Version"><img alt="Pc only.png" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/1/1a/Pc_only.png?version=4a80af62c86f487c483266e9b2c0b657" height="12" width="16"></abbr>)
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> Head
</td>
<td style="text-align:center"> 2
</td>
<td> Provides an effect similar to the <a href="/Night_Owl_Potion" title="Night Owl Potion">Night Owl Potion</a>
</td>
<td>
<ul><li>Drop from <a href="/Granite_Elemental" title="Granite Elemental">Granite Elemental</a>.</li>
<li>After defeating the <a href="/Martian_Madness" title="Martian Madness">Martian Madness</a>:
<ul><li>Sold by the <a href="/Cyborg" title="Cyborg">Cyborg</a> for <span data-info="100000" style="white-space:nowrap" title="10 Gold Coins">10 <img alt="Gold Coin" src="http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/terraria.gamepedia.com/1/1f/Gold_Coin.png?version=eac744abdf82b79ce189bf47a5726ad4" height="16" width="12"></span>.</li></ul></li></ul>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
